description: AMENDMENT 002Amendment 002 has been raised to answer a supplier's questions.File Number: W8476-236690NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT...)
full_summary:
## Tender Notice: Aircraft De-Icers Spares

The Department of National Defence has issued a request for proposals (RFP) for the procurement of aircraft de-icers spares.

### Procurement Information

* Contract Number: W8476-236690
* Solicitation Number: W8476-236690
* Tender Closing Date: March 23, 2023, 14:00:00
* Amendment Number: 2
* Amendment Date: March 14, 2023

### Procurement Requirements

The Department of National Defence requires the following items:

* Switches, toggle and push types, catalogued under NIBS codes N5930 and N5935, in various NSN and commodity codes.
* Circuit breakers, catalogued under NIBS code N5925, in various NSN and commodity codes.
* Relays, electromagnetic, catalogued under NIBS code N5945, in various NSN and commodity codes.
* Socket, plug-in electronic components, catalogued under NIBS code N5935, in various NSN and commodity codes.
* Semiconductor devices, diodes, catalogued under NIBS code N5961, in various NSN and commodity codes.
* Headsets, electrical, catalogued under NIBS code N5965, in various NSN and commodity codes.
* Lights, emergency, catalogued under NIBS code N6220, in various NSN and commodity codes.
* Switches, electrical, catalogued under NIBS code N2920, in various NSN and commodity codes.
* Sensors, air charged temperature, catalogued under NIBS code N2990, in various NSN and commodity codes.
* Filters, fluid, catalogued under NIBS code N2940, in various NSN and commodity codes.

### Bidder Information

* Bidders may submit requests for debriefing within 15 working days of receiving the bid solicitation results.
* Electronic submissions only (bidder email: Marie-claude.theoret@forces.gc.ca)
* Language: English or French accepted
* Notes: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers.

### Payment Information

* Payment terms will be specified in the contract.

### Quality Assurance

* Suppliers must comply with Part II of the CSV and DAC pertinently appropriate standards.

### Country of Origin

* Products supplied from Canada will be accepted.
